name: Flight 🐦
description:
Flight is a game about an explorer stranded on an unknown land that needs to fix their ship with the power of other birds.

This was our entry for the Indie Tales Jam 2021, you can rate it here.

How to play

Grab the ropes hanging from your ship and try to catch as many birds as you can so they can lift your ship.

There is an option (Assist Mode) in the pause menu to make time move slower and the game a little easier to handle for everyone.

Controls: ActionsKeyboardGamepadMove WASD, ZQSD or Left/right arrows D-Pad or Left stick JumpSpaceA or Cross button (X) InteractEX or Square button (▢) Pause/OptionsEscapeStart button

We do recommend a controller if you have one :)
